decision_conditions: The enlargement of fenestration, width and maximum height of the rear extension (retrospective) will necessitate reassessment of design and neighbouring residential amenity impacts as well as public re-consultation. The proposed amendments therefore cannot be accepted as a non-material amendment to planning permission 223981HH dated 08/11/2022 in accordance with Section 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990) and the Ealing Protocol for Non-Material Amendments Following a Grant of Planning Permission (2011).
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to enlarge the rooflight in the flat roof of the single storey rear extension in relation to planning permission reference 223981HH dated 08/11/2022 for 'Single storey rear infill extension; alteration to side fenestration involving installation of window to side elevation; removal of side door'
